title: 32 Killed In Bangladesh Clashes, Centre Asks Indians To "Be In Touch"
content: India has asked its citizens living in Bangladesh to be in touch and remain alert after 32 people died in fresh clashes between protesters and supporters of the ruling Awami League. Dozens were also injured in fierce clashes today.
summary: India has asked its citizens living in Bangladesh to be in touch and remain alert after 32 people died in fresh clashes between protesters and supporters of the ruling Awami League. Dozens were also injured in fierce clashes today.

title: Be In Touch, Stay Alert: Centre To Indians In Bangladesh Amid New Protests
content: The Indian Embassy in Bangladesh on Sunday issued an advisory urging Indian nationals residing in the country to "remain alert" as the student protests resumed in Sylhet, in which an unspecified number of people have got injured.
summary: The Indian Embassy in Bangladesh on Sunday issued an advisory urging Indian nationals residing in the country to "remain alert" as the student protests resumed in Sylhet, in which an unspecified number of people have got injured.

title: 2 Dead In Israel Stabbing, Palestinian Attacker From West Bank Killed
content: Two people were killed Sunday and two others wounded in a stabbing attack near Tel Aviv, Israeli medics said, with police reporting a Palestinian suspect was "neutralised" and later died in hospital.
summary: Two people were killed Sunday and two others wounded in a stabbing attack near Tel Aviv, Israeli medics said, with police reporting a Palestinian suspect was "neutralised" and later died in hospital.

title: Bangladesh Protesters Demand PM's Resignation, Army "By The People"
content: Thousands of Bangladeshi protesters, many wielding sticks, crowded into a central Dhaka square Sunday for mass protests demanding Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resign following a deadly police crackdown.
summary: Thousands of Bangladeshi protesters, many wielding sticks, crowded into a central Dhaka square Sunday for mass protests demanding Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resign following a deadly police crackdown.

title: 25 Years After Pokhran Sanctions, US Preps Red Carpet For ISRO Astronauts
content: In what is being described as a milestone in Indo-US partnership in the science and technology sphere, US space agency NASA is set to welcome two Indian astronauts for the Axiom-4 spaceflight mission
summary: In what is being described as a milestone in Indo-US partnership in the science and technology sphere, US space agency NASA is set to welcome two Indian astronauts for the Axiom-4 spaceflight mission

title: Bomb In Paris, Cross-Dressing In Beirut: How Israel Avenged Munich Massacre
content: During the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany, 11 Israeli athletes were killed by members of the Palestinian terrorist organisation Black September.
summary: During the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany, 11 Israeli athletes were killed by members of the Palestinian terrorist organisation Black September.

title: UK Student, 20, "Died For 25 Minutes" During Surgery After Extreme Sunburn
content: As doctors performed emergency surgery, his heart stopped for 25 minutes and he also suffered a mini-stroke.
summary: As doctors performed emergency surgery, his heart stopped for 25 minutes and he also suffered a mini-stroke.

title: Chinese University Announces Degree In 'Marriage' Amid Falling Birth Rates
content: The program aims to cultivate professionals to develop marriage-related industries and cultures and to promote China's positive marriage and family culture.
summary: The program aims to cultivate professionals to develop marriage-related industries and cultures and to promote China's positive marriage and family culture.

title: Who Is Astrologer Kushal Kumar, Predicting World War 3 Will Start Today
content: Renowned Indian astrologer Kushal Kumar, known as the "Indian Nostradamus", has issued a fresh warning that World War III will begin on either August 4 or August 5.
summary: Renowned Indian astrologer Kushal Kumar, known as the "Indian Nostradamus", has issued a fresh warning that World War III will begin on either August 4 or August 5.

title: "Looked Calm, There Was Storm Inside": Turkish Shooter On 'Cool' Posture
content: If coolness had a face, it would be Turkish shooter Yusuf Dikec's. The 51-year-old, who won the silver in 10-metre air pistol mixed team event at Paris Olympics without any special gear, is now the among the most searched person on Internet

title: 15 Killed In Israeli Airstrike On Gaza School Being Used As Shelter
content: An Israeli airstrike on a school sheltering displaced persons in Gaza City killed at least 15 Palestinians on Saturday, hours after two strikes in the occupied West Bank killed nine militants including a local Hamas commander, Hamas said.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on a school sheltering displaced persons in Gaza City killed at least 15 Palestinians on Saturday, hours after two strikes in the occupied West Bank killed nine militants including a local Hamas commander, Hamas said.

title: 'Agent Sadness', Poisoned Toothpaste: Inside Mossad's High Profile Kill Op

title: Abraham Alliance vs Axis Of Resistance: Who's Fighting Israel-Iran War

title: Fears Of All-Out War Grow In Middle East As Iran-Israel Conflict Widens
content: Middle East tensions have soared as Iran and Hamas, together with Hezbollah, vowed strong retaliation to the assassination of their group leaders, blamed on Israel, spurring fears of a regional war.

title: As Iran Strike Looms, Israel Hopes For "Abraham Alliance" With US, UK
content: Israeli defence officials say they are coordinating with the US and UK ahead of an expected strike by Iran, setting the stage for a repeat of a similar attack by Tehran in April that was repelled by allies.
summary: Israeli defence officials say they are coordinating with the US and UK ahead of an expected strike by Iran, setting the stage for a repeat of a similar attack by Tehran in April that was repelled by allies.
